verses.verse: Moreover thou shalt make<WH6213> the tabernacle<WH4908> with ten<WH6235> curtains<WH3407>; of fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>, and blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144>, with cherubim the work<WH4639> of the skilful<WH2803> workman<WH4639> shalt thou make them<WH6213>.

The length<WH753> of each<WH259> curtain<WH3407> shall be eight<WH8083> and twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520>, and the breadth<WH7341> of each<WH259> curtain<WH3407> four<WH702> cubits<WH520>: all the curtains<WH3407> shall have one<WH259> measure<WH4060>.
Five <WH2568> curtains<WH3407> shall be coupled together<WH2266> one<WH802> to another<WH269>; and the other five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> shall be coupled<WH2266> one<WH802> to another<WH269>.

And thou shalt make<WH6213> loops<WH3924> of blue<WH8504> upon the edge<WH8193> of the one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> from the selvedge<WH7098> in the coupling<WH2279>; and likewise shalt thou make<WH6213> in the edge<WH8193> of the curtain<WH3407> that is outmost<WH7020> in the second<WH8145> coupling<WH4225>.

Fifty <WH2572> loops<WH3924> shalt thou make<WH6213> in the one<WH259> curtain<WH3407>, and fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> shalt thou make<WH6213> in the edge<WH7097> of the curtain<WH3407> that is in the second<WH8145> coupling<WH4225>; the loops<WH3924> shall be opposite<WH6901> one<WH802> to another<WH269>.

And thou shalt make<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> clasps<WH7165> of gold<WH2091>, and couple<WH2266> the curtains<WH3407> one to another with<WH802> the clasps<WH7165>: and the tabernacle<WH4908> shall be one whole<WH259>.
And thou shalt make<WH6213> curtains<WH3407> of goats<WH5795>' hair for a tent<WH168> over the tabernacle<WH4908>: eleven<WH6249> curtains<WH3407> shalt thou make them<WH6213>.

The length<WH753> of each<WH259> curtain<WH3407> shall be thirty<WH7970> cubits<WH520>, and the breadth<WH7341> of each<WH259> curtain<WH3407> four<WH702> cubits<WH520>: the eleven<WH6249> curtains<WH3407> shall have one<WH259> measure<WH4060>.

And thou shalt couple<WH2266> five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> by themselves<WH8337>, and six curtains<WH3407> by themselves<WH3717>, and shalt double over the sixth<WH8345> curtain<WH3407> in the forefront<WH4136> of the tent<WH168>.

And thou shalt make<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> on the edge<WH8193> of the one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> that is outmost<WH7020> in the coupling<WH2279>, and fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> upon the edge<WH8193> of the curtain<WH3407> which is outmost in the second<WH8145> coupling<WH2279>.

And thou shalt make<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> clasps<WH7165> of brass<WH5178>, and put<WH935> the clasps<WH7165> into the loops<WH3924>, and couple<WH2266> the tent<WH168> together<WH259>, that it may be one.

And the overhanging<WH5629> part that remaineth<WH5736> of the curtains<WH3407> of the tent<WH168>, the half<WH2677> curtain<WH3407> that remaineth<WH5736>, shall hang<WH5628> over the back<WH268> of the tabernacle<WH4908>.

And the cubit<WH520> on the one side<WH2088>, and the cubit<WH520> on the other side<WH5736>, of that which remaineth in the length<WH753> of the curtains<WH3407> of the tent<WH168>, shall hang<WH5628> over the sides<WH6654> of the tabernacle<WH4908> on this side and on that side<WH3680>, to cover it.
And thou shalt make<WH6213> a covering<WH4372> for the tent<WH168> of rams<WH352>' skins<WH5785> dyed red<WH119>, and a covering<WH4372> of<WH4605> sealskins<WH5785> above<WH4605>.
And thou shalt make<WH6213> the boards<WH7175> for the tabernacle<WH4908> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>, standing up<WH5975>.
Ten <WH6235> cubits<WH520> shall be the length<WH753> of a board<WH7175>, and a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> the breadth<WH7341> of each<WH259> board<WH7175>.

Two <WH8147> tenons<WH3027> shall there be in each<WH259> board<WH7175>, joined one<WH259> to<WH7947> another<WH269>: thus shalt thou make<WH6213> for all the boards<WH7175> of the tabernacle<WH4908>.
And thou shalt make<WH6213> the boards<WH7175> for the tabernacle<WH4908>, twenty<WH6242> boards<WH7175> for the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> southward<WH8486>.

And thou shalt make<WH6213> forty<WH705> sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701> under the twenty<WH6242> boards<WH7175>; two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under one<WH259> board<WH7175> for its two<WH8147> tenons<WH3027>, and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under another<WH259> board<WH7175> for its two<WH8147> tenons<WH3027>:
and for the second<WH8145> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, on the north<WH6828> side<WH6285>, twenty<WH6242> boards<WH7175>,
and their forty<WH705> sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701>; two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under one<WH259> board<WH7175>, and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under another<WH259> board<WH7175>.
And for the hinder<WH3411> part of the tabernacle<WH4908> westward<WH3220> thou shalt make<WH6213> six<WH8337> boards<WH7175>.
And two<WH8147> boards<WH7175> shalt thou make<WH6213> for the corners<WH4742> of the tabernacle<WH4908> in the hinder part<WH3411>.

And they shall be double<WH8382> beneath<WH4295>, and in like manner<WH8382> they<WH3162> shall be entire unto the top<WH7218> thereof unto one<WH259> ring<WH2885>: thus shall it be for them both<WH8147>; they shall be for the two<WH8147> corners<WH4740>.

And there shall be eight<WH8083> boards<WH7175>, and their sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701>, sixteen<WH8337> sockets<WH134>; two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under one<WH259> board<WH7175>, and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under another<WH259> board<WH7175>.
And thou shalt make<WH6213> bars<WH1280> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>; five<WH2568> for the boards<WH7175> of the one<WH259> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908>,

and five<WH2568> bars<WH1280> for the boards<WH7175> of the other<WH8145> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, and five<WH2568> bars<WH1280> for the boards<WH7175> of the side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, for the hinder part<WH3411> westward<WH3220>.
And the middle<WH8484> bar<WH1280> in the midst<WH8432> of the boards<WH7175> shall pass<WH1272> through from end<WH7097> to end<WH7097>.

And thou shalt overlay<WH6823> the boards<WH7175> with gold<WH2091>, and make<WH6213> their rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091> for places<WH1004> for the bars<WH1280>: and thou shalt overlay<WH6823> the bars<WH1280> with gold<WH2091>.
And thou shalt rear up<WH6965> the tabernacle<WH4908> according to the fashion<WH4941> thereof which hath been showed<WH7200> thee in the mount<WH2022>.

And thou shalt make<WH6213> a veil<WH6532> of blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144>, and fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>: with cherubim<WH3742> the work<WH4639> of the skilful<WH2803> workman shall it be made<WH6213>:

and thou shalt hang<WH5414> it upon four<WH702> pillars<WH5982> of acacia<WH7848> overlaid<WH6823> with gold<WH2091>; their hooks<WH2053> shall be of gold<WH2091>, upon four<WH702> sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701>.

And thou shalt hang up<WH5414> the veil<WH6532> under the clasps<WH7165>, and shalt bring<WH935> in thither within<WH1004> the veil<WH6532> the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>: and the veil<WH6532> shall separate<WH914> unto you between the holy<WH6944> place and the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944>.
And thou shalt put<WH5414> the mercy-seat<WH3727> upon the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715> in the most<WH6944> holy place<WH6944>.

And thou shalt set<WH7760> the table<WH7979> without<WH2351> the veil<WH6532>, and the candlestick<WH4501> over against<WH5227> the table<WH7979> on the side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908> toward the south<WH8486>: and thou shalt put<WH5414> the table<WH7979> on the north<WH6828> side<WH6763>.

And thou shalt make<WH6213> a screen<WH4539> for the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168>, of blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8438>, and fine twined<WH7806> linen<WH8336>, the work<WH4639> of the embroiderer<WH7551>.

And thou shalt make<WH6213> for the screen<WH4539> five<WH2568> pillars<WH5982> of acacia<WH7848>, and overlay<WH6823> them with gold<WH2091>; their hooks<WH2053> shall be of gold<WH2091>: and thou shalt cast<WH3332> five<WH2568> sockets<WH134> of brass for them<WH5178>.
